ModMetaData.name: Flags and Banners (Canons Expansion)
ModMetaData.author: Canon
ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/qPmPtO6.png[/img] Expansion of Sadjuuk's mod, credits to mile for updating it
This DOES NOT require the main mod but I recommend you get it anyway. (You can find it [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2030264080] Here [/url] )
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1678847247] Graphics Settings really recommended, not just for this but in general. [/url]
Sorry for bad icon qualities or any mistakes i've made!
[img]https://i.imgur.com/anjAgxV.png[/img] - Real Life or Alt History Flags European Union United Nations Peoples Republic of China Poland (They can finally into space!) Germany German Empire (Kaiserreich) Germany (Coat of Arms) Germany (East Germany) Japanese Civil Flag Union of Soviet Socialist Republics (USSR) Russian Tsar's Coat of Arms Russian Imperial Flag (1858-1896) Russian Imperial Flag (1914-1917) Pirates Flag and Banner the Flag of Texas Confederate State's First flag, Stars and Bars Byzantine Cross Flag (Eastern Roman Empire) in Purple and Red Anarchist Flags ( Anarchist, AnCap, AnPrim ) DPRK (North Korea) Flag
- Added Fictional Universe Flags (Elder Scrolls) The Empire of Cyrodiil (Reman Empire) The Empire of Tamriel (Septim) (Miscellaneous) the Eldian Flag (Attack on Titan, Credit to u/NymnWales ) the Holy Britannian Empire (Code Geass)
[img]https://i.imgur.com/hdtEpun.png[/img]
They require the carpet research.
Plans (If I can figure out how to do them): - Make the flags like art from ideology so they buff rituals - Make a settings to enable / disable certain flags
[b]I will try my best to do any requests you may have or to fix bugs!.[/b]
